name: Supreme Pepperoni Pizza
description: Loaded with pepperoni, mozzarella, and our special tomato sauce on a crispy crust.

name: Juicy Beef Burger
description: A succulent beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, onion, and cheese in a soft bun.

name: Veggie Delight Pizza
description: Fresh vegetables, cheese, and herbs on a thin crust with tomato sauce.

description: Al dente pasta tossed in a creamy sauce with bacon, eggs, and parmesan cheese.

name: Golden Crispy Fries

description: Ham, pineapple, and cheese on a classic crust for a sweet and savory treat.

name: Pesto Pasta

name: Loaded Fries
description: Fries topped with cheese, bacon, and green onions.
